articles.content: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT graphics card will cost Rs. 64,990 (SEP) in India before GST, the company shared through a post on Instagram. AMD unveiled three new graphics cards in its Radeon RX 6000 series … [+1852 chars]

articles.title: Oppo Reno 5 Pro Allegedly Spotted on TENAA, Quad Rear Camera Setup Tipped - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Oppo Reno 5 Pro has allegedly been spotted on TENAA with a 6.55-inch display, and 4,250mAh battery. The photos of the smartphone show a quad rear camera setup which is likely to have a 64-megapixel primary sensor.
